channel.title: ProcessingJS and Java?
channel.description: what is the difference between ProcessingJS and Java? i know they are different languages but they seem very similar.. please let me know if im stupid and im not seeing something. because ive found tutorials on how to make 2d games in processingjs but i want to use eclipse to make them. can i use eclipse to make these but the same method as the tutorials for processingjs?

item.title: ProcessingJS and Java?
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Ambokile:

“Java is to JavaScript as car is to carpet.”

I love this quote.

Read full topic
